org.sakaiproject.util

Class ResourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.ResourceLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Map, InternationalizedMessages

    public class ResourceLoader
extends Object
implements InternationalizedMessages
    ResourceLoader provides an alternate implementation of org.util.ResourceBundle, dynamically selecting the prefered locale from either the user's session or from the user's sakai preferences
    Author:
    Sugiura, Tatsuki (University of Nagoya)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.Map

      • formatDebugPropertiesString

        protected String formatDebugPropertiesString(String key)
        This method formats a debugging string using the properties key. This allows easy identification of context for properties keys, and also highlights any hard-coded text, when the debug locale is selected

      • getLocale

        Get user's preferred locale (or null if not set)

      • setContextLocale

        public Locale setContextLocale(Locale loc)
        Sets user's prefered locale in context First: sets locale from Sakai user preferences, if available Second: sets locale from user session, if available Last: sets system default locale
        Returns:
        user's Locale object

      • getStrings

        public String[] getStrings(String key)
        Access some named property values as an array of strings. The name is the base name. name + ".count" must be defined to be a positive integer - how many are defined. name + "." + i (1..count) must be defined to be the values.
        Parameters:
        key - property key to look up in current ResourceBundle
        Returns:
        The property value with this name, or the null if not found.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • loadBundleFromDb

        protected ResourceBundle loadBundleFromDb(Locale loc)
        Return ResourceBundle for specified locale. Returns values from the classpath overridden with any values found in the database via the MessageService. Also, responsible for indexing any new or changes values.
        Parameters:
        loc - properties bundle * *
        Returns:
        locale specific ResourceBundle (or empty ListResourceBundle in case of error)
